WorkItem.Description:
The HTTP service located at http://localhost/StreamInsight/Default is too busy. 
-------------------
The remote server returned an error: (503) Server Unavailable.
===========
Server 2008 Std, Roles installed: IIS, SQL Svr 2008 R2.  Need anything else ?

Comments.Message:
Sorry for the late reply. Have a look at this blog posting, it talks about this error: http://blogs.msdn.com/b/appfabriccat/archive/2010/10/21/streaminsight-getting-started-with-using-the-event-flow-debugger-viewing-diagnostics-and-exposing-the-management-service.aspx
Please let us know if this did not resolve the issue!
